alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brunswick and east central Horry Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 723 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wampee, or near North Myrtle Beach, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts between 35 and 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Myrtle Beach, Sunset Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Little River, Cherry Grove Inlet, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Grissettown, Seaside, Hand, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Wampee, Longs, Brooksville, Cherry Grove Beach, Briarcliffe Acres, Atlantic Beach and Sea Coast Medical Center. This includes the following highways... US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 10. SC Highway 31 between mile markers 16 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 25 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
